title: [Brigantine, Main Deck]
description: A rectangular sail hanging from a wooden mast casts a large shadow across a misty grey spruce gangplank, while rigging creates a dark, web-like pattern across the planks of the main deck. Along both sides of the ship, some cannons stand at the ready.  A lone gull circles overhead, its sonorous call a greeting to those on board.
paths: Obvious paths: east, west, up, down
